actionName: Replacement of diesel tractors and road machinery with electric ones.

action.ActionName: Replacement of diesel tractors and road machinery with electric ones.
action.Description: Road construction and maintenance machinery can transition to electric alternatives, reducing emissions in parallel sectors.
Dependencies: Development of electric alternatives for road construction and maintenance machinery, ensuring performance meets industry standards.
Establishment of charging infrastructure and service networks to support the transition to electric machinery.
Financial incentives and subsidies to encourage the adoption of electric machinery in construction and maintenance projects.
KeyPerformanceIndicators: Reduction in operating costs for electric machinery (%).
Percentage of agricultural productivity maintained or increased after implementation.
Maintenance cost reduction for electric machinery compared to diesel counterparts (%).
